manifest.name: Time Display
manifest.author: PixSim Team
manifest.description: Shows current world time in a compact overlay

code:
const plugin = { async onEnable(api) { api.ui.addOverlay({ id: 'time-display', position: 'top-left', render: function() { const state = api.state.getGameState(); const time = state.worldTime || { day: 1, hour: 8 }; const div = document.createElement('div'); div.innerHTML = '
Day ' + time.day + ' - ' + String(time.hour).padStart(2, "0") + ':00
'; return div.firstChild; } }); this.unsubscribe = api.state.subscribe(() => {}); console.info('Time Display plugin enabled'); }, async onDisable() { if (this.unsubscribe) { this.unsubscribe(); } console.info('Time Display plugin disabled'); } };
